title: HenSemi
opening_song: "Mania e Kirakira" (マニアエキラキラ) by Kana Hanazawa
ending_song: "Hen ・ Rin ・ Sham ~Hen da yo. Rinse no ato ni Shampoo te~" by Kana Hanazawa, Minoru Shiraishi, Norihisa Mori & Takashi Matsuyama
sinopse:
Matsutaka Nanako is a normal university student, who happened to enroll in an Abnormal Physiology seminar. She tries to keep her mental state sound, but other abnormal classmates start to influence her personality...

(Source: MU)
